uls-desc: Tisim onɛ tʋmili la suoya bɛdegʋ ka o gaŋ Pian'ad ka tɔlis pian'ad maalʋg nam.
ext-uls-undo-language-tooltip-text-local: Pian'ad n tiaki n tis wiki nwa. Gɔsimi fʋ [[Special:GlobalPreferences|global preferences]] n ti'ak pian'ad tis wiki bama wusa.
uls-betafeature-desc: Bigisim pian'ad la giŋ-giŋ yʋda, nɛ pian'ad nam banɛ mɔr sʋŋiri tisif
ext-uls-display-settings-desc: Maalim pian'ad tʋm tis li zi'is nɛ li sɔb wina.
ext-uls-language-buttons-help: Tiakim pian'ad gaŋir zig la. Pian'ad Yɛlzug kʋ tiakɛ
ext-uls-display-settings-anon-log-in-cta: [[Special:UserLogin|Log in]] n gaŋ pian'ad kanɛ bɛɛ li kɔn' tis zi'isa.
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-title: Vɛɛgim sɔb ziesa saŋkanɛ ka bɔɔdim bɛ
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-info: Vɛɛgim sɔb wina banɛ kai li miŋ ka bas suori n tis sɔb wina ngan'sʋg
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for-ui-info: Sɔb winim tis onɛ tʋm la zi'ig
ext-uls-back-to-display-settings: Lɛm maalʋg nam isi bigis ni
ext-uls-disable-input-method: Tʋmim ne buudi sɔb biela zig
jquery-ime-disable-text: Tʋmim ne buudi sɔb biela zig
ext-uls-input-settings-noime: Kpe'esʋg dɔlisʋg kai nie paalʋ tis pian'ad kaŋa
ext-uls-input-disable-notification-info-: Fʋ tɔn'ɛ bas suor Kpe'esʋg laad la saŋa kanɛ wusa yi pian'ad maalʋg namin
Fʋ tɔn'ɛ bas suor Kpe'esʋg laad la saŋa kanɛ wusa yi pian'ad maalʋg namin kpi'e pian'ad laasʋgin la
ext-uls-compact-link-info: Pian'ad wusa (yiiga gaŋir yid fʋ bɔɔdim ne sieba)
ext-uls-compact-language-links-preferenc: Tʋm nɛ [[$1|pian'ad tibisim yʋda]], nɛ pian'ad nam banɛ mɔr sʋŋir tisif
ext-uls-compact-no-results: Lʋgir kaŋa pi bɛ paalʋ pian'ad ka fʋ ieed la ni
ext-uls-setlang-error: Gbeliŋ bɛɛn fʋn maliŋin maani fʋ pian'ad bɔɔdim la. Gbeliŋ:$1
ext-uls-setlang-message: Suor kanɛ ka fʋ dɔl la buosi bigisid zi'igin la nɛ $1 ($2)
ext-uls-empty-state-header-actions-avail: Pian'ad nan kai. Paasim bʋn paal
ext-uls-empty-state-desc-actions-availab: Maalim yɛzug la paalʋ pian'ad nam pamm ni
